item.description:
@F_A_I_L_S wrote:

[quote=“Yankees_, post:14, topic:414326”]hey can i beta test, i look for common glitches and i can make videos/ code[/quote]That’s what a beta tester is, They look for glitches/bugs, after they find them, they report them to the Developer.
